original_text:
By myself I have sworn,
    my mouth has uttered in all integrity
    a word that will not be revoked:
Before me every knee will bow;
    by me every tongue will swear.
korean_text: 내가 나를 두고 맹세하기를 내 입에서 공의로운 말이 나갔은즉 돌아오지 아니하나니 내게 모든 무릎이 꿇겠고 모든 혀가 맹세하리라 하였노라

sentences.original_text: my mouth has uttered in all integrity
a word that will not be revoked
Before me every knee will bow
sentences.korean_translation: 내 앞에 모든 무릎이 꿇을 것이며

sentences.original_text: by me every tongue will swear
